choices.answer: As the temperature increases, the rate of sweat production decreases.

questions.question: What effect does ADH have on the kidneys?

choices.answer: Helps to reabsorb more water resulting in a more concentrated urine
Helps to reabsorb less water resulting in a more dilute urine
Helps to release more water resulting in a more concentrated urine
Helps to release more water resulting in a more dilute urine

questions.question: Passage of water across a selectively permeable membrane is
If a red blood cell is placed in a hypotonic solution, what changes do you expect to see?
If a plant cell is placed in a Hypertonic solution, what changes will the cell undergo?

choices.answer: Cell loses water and gets plasmolysed
Cell gains water and becomes turgid

questions.question: Which statement is true for Isotonic solutions?

choices.answer: They have the same solute concentration.
They have the same solvent concentration.
They have more solute than solvent concentration
There is no net movement of water

questions.question: Osmosis is a form of diffusion but not vice- versa.
